amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 1053, the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 116-58 is adopted.
amendment.purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 1053, the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 116-58 is adopted.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
